page.name: National Chinese Honor Society
page.description: NCHS members actively engage in, explore, and promote Chinese culture in and outside of the school community.
page.sectionOneContent: You must be in the course Mandarin II or above to join. Native speakers may also join. Applications for new members are available each spring.
page.sectionTwoContent: Members are expected to attend mandatory meetings and will need 8 total volunteer hours per year. At least 2 volunteer hours must come from tutoring Mandarin students (NCHS will host tutoring sessions).
